content: this legal case involves a cost procedure in which one party is responsible for paying the costs the court has issued a judgment against the defendant ordering them to pay a sum of eur 35245 within 15 days the case has reached the court of appeal which has dismissed the appeals and upheld the judgment made by the court of first instance the case involves the division of matrimonial property and the coowned property will be divided equally between the parties the defendant has appealed the judgment based on errors in the law and procedural requirements the court of appeal has granted access to half of the joint money that remained in the defendants possession the court has determined that there are savings amounting to eur 5583442 in the coowned property the costs of representation and expert witnesses in the case are determined based on the success achieved by each party the court of second instance has upheld the judgment of the court of first instance in part both parties are responsible for the costs of the appeal proceedings

metadata.cost: EUR 35'245.00 EUR of compensation on 55'834.42 of coowned property
